name: Parasite - The Minim
description:
UPDATE: LAST MINIGAME HOTFIXED (GRAVITY WAS BROKEN)

(https://kushiri.itch.io/uncgamejam2022)

Follow along the experience of the circle of life.

Game idea was inspired by zombie parasites (especially the video of a snail having its eyestalks taken over in order to display colors to attract a bird to eat it). 

In the first stage, you play as a parasite attempting to infect the host cells, avoiding the white blood cells that aim to kill you. 

Upon succeeding, you play as the infected snail, playing an EDM show in order to attract a bird to eat you.

As you take control of the bird, you happily waltz your way to be eaten by an un suspecting human.

The human has a terrible day; gets a severe stomachache, before dispelling the parasite which returns to the river beginning the cycle once again.

How to play:

Intro [Press A to begin]

Stage 1 [A & D to rotate, SPACE to pulse forwards)

Stage 2 [Follow A S D F Prompts]

Stage 3 [A & D to move, SPACE to jump]

Stage 4 [SPACE]

Made by:

brwonze

guyonyourleft

kushiri
